sentence: Pida poyorcʹ tad to aniq wandakocyamda tad nǣda aniq wandakoda tyersi ǣwakuda syancyokuda yaңguq.
Tyedaawh maqniwq taki ti maqniwq nyenǣy maqniwq tyuku [nyeracbortʃiwo].
«Yuq tibyamh nibqnand pirasq ma tyuku maqniwq yesya săland yedh ti aŋgun, maqniwq,
Tăd tikād (< tikaăd) tiki oyh ninya soyaqmaădăni
Tăd tăkad ti tyedah tiki mǣnyuq, yolʹcyeqmaădani, yetya oyh nih măncăralluwh.
Nyerdyenadoh tǣnako urko tadtikaad poңga urko tadtikaad yat amgǣriq urkoq ңǣbtoq ңodh ңoka urkoqnaq urada.
taqalʹh tamalyaŋgana manǣqmandoh malyaŋgana macʹ tiki
tiki lăbtǣy myunya ŋǣdi ŋanih silpa pyayda.
Tămna nyerdye tolawdawǣy" ŋǣ"ni"im", yat' syaari' ŋok" ŋǣdaki".
Tadkăd tiki tayad tawi tiki tiq lyekar'
Tikayeǣwaăd Noy mărădyaŋgawar tikari yaana tӣ tiki tăndh tiki lǣtămbidăwa,
maqniwq – tiki toqǒla nyenǣcʹh yǎŋgobta tara».
Tiki yaad ŋani yalyah syaărih unădh yadbăqnanda ŋodh,
«Tyuku myadh myunya ŋawnanda nisyanad ŋǣwi ŋǣbtumh,
Wari myaqңǣ myarada myata taaw ti ңaat sidya sǣrmh mǣta asawada tari myattyu.
Tădawa numh narah nyaŋǣŋǣ pilibtariq ayō,
maqniwq tikih nye nyu maqniwq tiki mǣsʹ tara maqniwq».
nyabir ăncyerkarth ŋudida aqăwra yaqămida adăh adănda nyaqmiqkat.
Pulita, pulita tyuquqkumna yah ŋilh sǣywi.
tiki syerti malyebtih mănʹ ŋǣdăŋguuyun, ti.
urkări mǣnh ărwăna nidih maqniwh yaah ŋilʹnyana tănyaŋguqmaq.
Lorcǣy lorcǣy noy piqil pitowq tarq piqil pitowq!
Maqniwq tad nyernyah ti yah obămh tiki toqǒla nyenǣcʹh yǎŋgobta tara.
Syanrinda ŋodh yadbăta ŋodh tiki yawh ǣw susa nyenǣy yah nih tănǣyq.
Ti tyuku laanakoi laanakokocyar ңodh tinyoq acyaq waalarkanyoq nyenǣy sabye laanako ninyoqңaq ңani tayna anda ңanih taki…
tuyesăkomda ti maqniwq sih nih ŋabtada.
ănyaărt ŋǣdărawanh nidoh ărwaq tiki adămdoh.
Yenyad ңarwǣ siqiwda pyebyada saltǣ toondoh yoracʹ ǣbtoh nilak adabtoh  taqwawdawǣyh niimcyatidohmyakandoh tobtoh nyabadoh nyeqyaq todoh ңuq paandq moyocyatida.
«ăbărtaana ŋǣdalyowi syudbya maqniwq ărta yǎŋgu yah obah nimnya,
«Mănʹ ti tăryemh syertăwini tăd nyernyah tărcya nyenǣcyah yǎŋgoda –
siqiw ăbărtaqyaq ŋopoy nitoh yēŋgawna yadaq.
Nyonda si ŋanih tăqăyalʹnyah ŋǣwi aniq,
Ti, siqiw yuq ŋămgǣǣw poona, yekar".
Ta maqniwq tyuku ǣwa ǣwakuni syancyokuni anyana anasyad?
Mănyaq myaqmaq niwidoh urkaădtaq, yaŋgănya ŋǣsin' mǣrkawidoh.
Myaq tiki asawand Noy mărădyaŋgh yuna mǣtăda noyda tănyawi ŋobtiki tiki noyhtoqǒla.
paryeŋodah nyabi arădh ǣw maqniwq yǎŋgoda maqniwq,
Tiki yaăna maqniwq onawaana wada yǎŋgoya,
abiiyuta myath aya aniq abiiyuta tiq ninya yewǣydih ңa ayowi.
Praktikanta tǣri sircyǎti tiki, yekar, ŋămgǣǣna awămda syaaq mănǣqŋada.
